availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph T. Lokey (Brown County, Ohio, harness maker )

body.p: Brown County, Ohio, harness maker. Ohio native. Harness maker in Worcester County, Maryland, in 1860. Harness maker in Brown County, Ohio, in 1863. Enlisted in the Regular Army in Baltimore, Maryland, on October 9, 1860. Reported as "deserted" on October 10, 1860. Served in the 12th Ohio Volunteer Infantry as a private from April 1861 to August 1861. Served in the 10th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry as a first lieutenant and second lieutenant from August 1862 to August 1863. Served in the 11th Ohio Volunteer Cavalry as a private from February 1864 to September 1865.
